title: Couple With Heart: Person, Man, Medium-Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple with heart (person, man, medium-light skin tone)
description: Represents a loving romantic relationship between a person and a man, with a heart symbolizing their affection. The specific skin tone indicates a medium-light complexion.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji portrays a loving embrace between a person with no specific skin tone and a woman with a medium-light skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart. Apple‚Äôs characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting make the heart appear luminous and full of warmth, while the figures' soft, rounded edges convey tenderness. This emoji beautifully symbolizes romantic partnership, love, and the formation of a loving bond, particularly resonating with its inclusive representation on Apple devices.
